title: Multimodal Pipelines for Stroke Detection
author: Radiant Group
excerpt: Designing stroke detection systems using complementary sensory modalities.
content:
## Context
Stroke symptoms manifest across visual and auditory signals.

## Problem Statement
Single-modality systems miss critical cues.

## Design Principles
- Modular fusion
- Signal-level evaluation

## System Overview
Audio and vision pipelines are fused at representation level.

## Evaluation
Each modality is evaluated independently.

## Limitations
Temporal synchronization remains complex.

## Conclusion
Multimodal pipelines align with clinical reality.
